description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
another individual present but not participating – can be an infant or in rare cases an adult
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/orangutan
whether the participant had previous experience - participated (with previous experience)/ naive  (with no previous experience)
whether participants took the tools or not
whether tool was used in an appropriate manner according to task
time participant spent in the left room
time participant spent in the food room
time participant spent in the middle right room
time participant spent in the right room
strategies depending on the tools first taken and the tools first used
participant drop out /not included in analyses
